title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.21 - Aircraft to be taxied by qualified persons only
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.21 - Aircraft to be taxied by qualified persons only

State Regulations

No aircraft shall be taxied at the air terminal unless a
certificated pilot certificated to operate that particular type of aircraft or
a certificated A and P mechanic properly qualified to taxi that particular type
of aircraft shall be attending the controls. In the case of helicopters, only a
certificated helicopter pilot shall attend the controls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
